definitions.definition: Any of the herbs of genus Sanguisorba (syn. Poterium ), including salad burnet ( Sanguisorba minor ), an herb used in salads and herbal teas .
Any of several species of moths of the family Zygaenidae , typically having black forewings with red spots .

main_definition: Any of the herbs of genus Sanguisorba (syn. Poterium ), including salad burnet ( Sanguisorba minor ), an herb used in salads and herbal teas .
secondary_definitions: Any of several species of moths of the family Zygaenidae , typically having black forewings with red spots .
